what.title: What is FunMagic?
what.content: FunMagic is a platform that provides AI-powered creative tools. You can use our tools to remove backgrounds from images, generate 3D models, create designs, and more. All tools are accessible through a simple credit-based system.

credits.title: How do credits work?
credits.content: Credits are the currency used to access AI tools on FunMagic. Each tool has a specific credit cost based on the complexity of the processing. You can purchase credit packages from our pricing page. Some packages include bonus credits for better value.

formats.title: What file formats are supported?
formats.content: Most of our image tools support common formats including JPEG, PNG, and WebP. Specific tools may support additional formats -- check each tool's description for details on supported input and output formats.

processing.title: How long does processing take?
processing.content: Processing time varies depending on the tool and the complexity of your input. Simple operations like background removal typically complete within seconds, while more complex tasks like 3D model generation may take a few minutes. You'll see a progress indicator during processing.

refunds.title: Can I get a refund on credits?
refunds.content: Credits are generally non-refundable. However, if a tool fails to process your content due to a system error, the credits will be automatically refunded to your account. If you experience issues, please contact our support team.

storage.title: Where are my generated assets stored?
storage.content: All generated assets are stored in your personal asset library, accessible from the "My Assets" page. You can download or delete your assets at any time. Assets are stored securely in the cloud and are only accessible to you.

expiry.title: Do credits expire?
expiry.content: Credit expiration policies depend on the package you purchase. Please check the specific terms of each credit package for details on expiration periods.

security.title: Is my data safe?
security.content: Yes, we take data security seriously. All data is encrypted in transit and at rest. We do not share your personal data or uploaded content with third parties. Please review our Privacy Policy for more details on how we handle your data.

acceptance.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By accessing and using FunMagic ("the Service"), you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use the Service.

description.title: 2. Description of Service
description.content: FunMagic provides AI-powered creative tools that allow users to process, generate, and transform digital content. The Service operates on a credit-based system where users purchase credits to access various tools and features.

accounts.title: 3. User Accounts
accounts.content: You must create an account to use most features of the Service. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials and for all activities that occur under your account. You agree to notify us immediately of any unauthorized use of your account.

credits.title: 4. Credits and Payments
credits.content: The Service uses a credit-based system. Credits are consumed when you use AI tools. Credit packages can be purchased through the pricing page. Credits are non-refundable except as required by applicable law. Unused credits may expire according to the terms specified at the time of purchase.

acceptable.title: 5. Acceptable Use
acceptable.content: You agree not to use the Service for any illegal or unauthorized purpose. You must not use the Service to generate content that is harmful, abusive, or violates the rights of others. We reserve the right to suspend or terminate accounts that violate these terms.

ip.title: 6. Intellectual Property
ip.content: Content generated using the Service belongs to you, subject to the limitations of the underlying AI models. You grant us a limited license to store and process your content as needed to provide the Service. We retain all rights to the Service itself, including its design, code, and branding.

liability.title: 7. Limitation of Liability
liability.content: The Service is provided "as is" without warranties of any kind. We are not liable for any indirect, incidental, or consequential damages arising from your use of the Service. Our total liability is limited to the amount you paid for the Service in the past 12 months.

changes.title: 8. Changes to Terms
changes.content: We may update these Terms of Service from time to time. We will notify you of significant changes via email or through the Service. Your continued use of the Service after changes take effect constitutes acceptance of the updated terms.

contact.title: 9. Contact
contact.content: If you have questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us at support@funmagic.ai.

collect.title: 1. Information We Collect
collect.content: We collect information you provide directly, such as your name, email address, and payment information when you create an account or purchase credits. We also collect usage data including the tools you use, processing times, and uploaded content metadata.

use.title: 2. How We Use Your Information
use.content: We use your information to provide and improve the Service, process payments, communicate with you about your account, and ensure the security of our platform. We may also use aggregated, anonymized data for analytics and service improvement.

processing.title: 3. Content Processing
processing.content: Files and content you upload are processed by our AI tools and may be temporarily stored on our servers. Processed results are stored in your asset library until you choose to delete them. We do not use your uploaded content to train AI models without your explicit consent.

sharing.title: 4. Data Sharing
sharing.content: We do not sell your personal information. We may share data with third-party service providers who help us operate the Service (such as payment processors and cloud hosting providers). These providers are bound by contractual obligations to protect your data.

security.title: 5. Data Security
security.content: We implement industry-standard security measures to protect your data, including encryption in transit and at rest, access controls, and regular security audits. However, no method of transmission over the Internet is 100% secure, and we cannot guarantee absolute security.

retention.title: 6. Data Retention
retention.content: We retain your account information for as long as your account is active. Your generated assets are stored until you delete them or close your account. Transaction records are retained for legal and accounting purposes as required by applicable law.

rights.title: 7. Your Rights
rights.content: You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal data. You can download your assets at any time and request deletion of your account. To exercise these rights, contact us at privacy@funmagic.ai.

cookies.title: 8. Cookies
cookies.content: We use essential cookies to maintain your session and preferences. We may use analytics cookies to understand how you use the Service. You can manage cookie preferences through your browser settings.

changes.title: 9. Changes to This Policy
changes.content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of material changes via email or through the Service. The date of the latest revision is indicated at the bottom of this page.

contact.title: 10. Contact Us
contact.content: For privacy-related inquiries, please contact us at privacy@funmagic.ai.
